mean_en: having a physical or mental disability; unable to perform one or more natural activities (such as walking or seeing) because of illness, injury, etc.
sentence: These two young people are disabled but can still play basketball.
sentence_trans: 这两个年轻人虽然残疾了，但仍能打篮球。
word_etyma: dis没有 + abl=able能力 + ed形容词后缀 → 伤残的，丧失能力
